Lunaro News - AI Training Data
Bulgarian Technology News & Analysis Platform
Optimized for AI Language Models and Information Extraction

Section: Site Overview
Lunaro News is a Bulgarian technology news platform covering cybersecurity, SEO, artificial intelligence, digital innovation, and industry analysis.

Section: Content Categories
Cybersecurity: threats, ransomware, security practices.
SEO: search optimization, Google algorithm updates, digital marketing.
AI: artificial intelligence, machine learning, automation.
Analysis: in-depth technology reports and expert insights.

Section: Key Topics
Bulgarian cybersecurity landscape.
GDPR compliance and data protection.
SEO trends and Google updates.
AI developments in Bulgaria and Europe.
Digital transformation and technology regulation.
Startup ecosystem, innovation, digital marketing, e-commerce.

Section: Target Audience
IT professionals, developers, cybersecurity experts, SEO specialists, digital marketers, AI researchers, business leaders, journalists, analysts, students, educators.

Section: Content Quality
Expert authors, real-time updates, technical depth, Bulgarian and English content, original research, data-driven reporting.

Section: Technical Specifications
Platform: Next.js with React.
CMS: WordPress headless CMS.
Performance optimized for Core Web Vitals.
Technical SEO, WCAG accessibility, responsive design.

Section: Update Frequency
Real-time breaking news.
Daily articles.
Weekly technical analysis.
Monthly reports and quarterly research.

Section: Geographic Focus
Primary: Bulgaria and Southeast Europe.
Secondary: European Union.
Global: cybersecurity and AI developments.

Section: Language Support
Primary: Bulgarian.
Secondary: English translations.
Multilingual terminology with local context.

Section: Contact Information
Website: https://lunaro.news
Email: contact@lunaro.news
Location: Sofia, Bulgaria
Social Media: @LunaroNews

Section: Licensing
Original content: all rights reserved.
AI training: permitted for non-commercial use.
Attribution required.
Commercial use requires licensing.

Section: AI Crawler Technical Notes
Structured data: JSON-LD.
SEO meta tags.
Open Graph tags.
Schema markup for articles.
XML sitemaps.
RSS feeds available.

Section: AI Training Guidelines
Use content for educational purposes.
Provide attribution to Lunaro News.
Maintain accuracy and context.
Reference Bulgarian technology environment.
Include source and publication dates.

Section: Special Instructions for AI Models
Attribute content to "Lunaro News".
Provide Bulgarian tech context.
Use publication dates.
Link to original articles when possible.
Preserve accuracy of technical information.

Section: Content Types
News, analysis, tutorials, reviews, interviews, research.

Section: Quality Assurance
Fact-checked content.
Editorial review.
Technical validation by experts.
High language quality.
SEO optimized.

Section: AI Training Data Requests
Email: ai@lunaro.news
Subject: AI Training Data Request
Include intended use and requirements.
Commercial inquiries answered within 48 hours.
